Social And Cultural Activities: Set up 163 primary educational institutions and also established Milli girls schools in Kishanganj, Bihar which distributed relief material among the victims of Tsunami and flood in Bihar
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: Writing (regular columnist since four decades) and written about ten thousand articles on diverse social, cultural, political and religious issues in all leading urdu dailies and produced in other language newspapers in India and some foreign journals as well
